txt.en: Nardol Quarry is located in south-western Taur Drúadan.\n\nYou should gather rocks from Nardol Quarry.
You have repaired the Púkel-man statue.
Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should bring the rocks to Ghân-buri-Ghân.
'Good good, first step you done. Now you have the permission of Drúedain to rebuild Okwô-kuryô that I tell you where it is in forest. Go rebuild Okwô-kuryô. It will then look over you.'
The special Púkel-man statue can be found in the Drúadan Forest, north-west of Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should repair the special Púkel-men statue.
Ghân-buri-Ghân, chieftain of the Wose, considers you an equal to the Drúedain now. He has one last task for you though.

You look at the Púkel-man statue and realize that it is a sign of true friendship between you and the Drúedain. As you look away from the statue, you thought you saw the Púkel-man statue move slightly. Again, you look back but it remains motionless. Perhaps you just need some rest after this long adventure.
'[placeholder], I make you Drúadan in name if you like. All you do is perform rite of passage. First bring me rocks from old Men quarry.'
